lead_paragraph: The drugs testing system imposed on Russia following revelations of widespread doping is inefficient and the country must be part of the decision-making process to battle the problem, Russia's outgoing Olympic Committee (ROC) chief has said.

headline.print_headline: Doping System Imposed on Russia Is Not Effective: Zhukov
headline.main: Doping System Imposed on Russia Is Not Effective: Zhukov

snippet: The drugs testing system imposed on Russia following revelations of widespread doping is inefficient and the country must be part of the decision-making process to battle the problem, Russia's outgoing Olympic Committee (ROC) chief has said....
